name: Be The µ-Wave
description:
Get in the role of a microwave and try to heat some food, without burning it.

Everything is controlled with space bar. Tap it to change the menu selection or hold it to confrim selection.

This short game was created at the 'Global Game Jam 2017' (48 hours) by Frederik Reher, Felix Urbalisk, Jan Hönerbach, Lisa Siech & Alexander Sinzig.

Due to the short creating period it has some bugs but it's fun to play nevertheless.

Note: The 'End Game'-button does nothing in the browser-version (but isn't needed there as you can always switch / close the tab).
